About Me

I am a freelance Full Stack Web Developer who designs and programs reliable, maintainable web sites. I'm enthusiastic about accessibility, simplicity, and clean code.

Skills: Semantic HTML, CSS (SCSS & BEM), Javascript, Git Version Control (Github), Web Design (Adobe XD), and Web Accessibility.

 

Portfolio

Reels

View Project

Reels was a collaborative application that utilizes a movie database (themoviedb.org) to return all movies of a chosen genre within a chosen year, which the user can then flip through (the concept was to mimmic "swiping" like on dating apps). My role on this project was front-end engineer, and I worked with a second front-end engineer and a back-end engineer.

Moose Club

View Project

Moose Club is a simple responsive landing page containing a text overview of the purpose of the website or organization, with a photo gallery. The site accessible and responsive for all screen sizes. (Moose is my dog).

RNM!

View Project

Random Number Melee is an interactive guessing game with a simple yet creative design. design.
